hotels.title: Laos Five-Star Luxury in Elegant Vientiane with Glittering Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Experience the perfect combination of traditional culture and cosmopolitan living with a charming stay at Crowne Plaza Vientiane, an IHG Hotel. Experience the wonders of Laos' largest city, dotted with gleaming Buddhist temples, elegant malls and prestigious golf courses. When you're not exploring, unwind in the infinity edge outdoor pool or at the tranquil spa, and savour the local cuisine at the onsite restaurants.
